name: July (Beneath Light)
description:
"Soon things will go, bad"

The final series of Beneath Light ends here. Make sure to follow this game to receive latest information and be the first one to play it.
Chapter 3 is awaiting for you.

Story:

You are playing as Nicole. Yesterday you received a call from your father asking if you could go and bring July back home.
You fell asleep and couldn't do anything, it was too late. There was a storm being announced. Later that day, your father called to notice you that your sister, July, wasn't at the hospital.
You now have the feeling that your sister might have left somewhere else and might never return home.

Note:

Once you enter a Room. You won't be able to return.
Choose your destiny wisely.
To fully understand this game we recommend you watch Chapters 1 & 2 on YouTube since some people had to the opportunity to play it.

Credits:

-Carlo Tejeda, Director for Environment and Sound Build-ups
-Nicole Ly, Coder and Environment Designer
-Michael Lagos, Music Designer
-Jose Martinez, Tester for Errors and Grammar Helper

Release Date: 14th of July
